biotools.summary: POMO (Plotting Omics-associations for Multiple Organisms) is a web application to integrate and visualize genomic feature relationships and annotations across a broad range of organisms – human, mouse, nematode, fly, yeast, zebra fish, e. coli, arabidopsis, rice and tomato.

bioschemas.name: POMO
